thread.title: Stephen Colbert Suggests The Perfect Replacement For Michael Flynn
thread.title_full: Stephen Colbert Suggests The Perfect Replacement For Michael Flynn

author: Lee Moran
title: Stephen Colbert Suggests The Perfect Replacement For Michael Flynn
text: Stephen Colbert Suggests The Perfect Replacement For Michael Flynn "He's a really super guy." 02/15/2017 05:56 am ET Lee Moran Trends Editor, The Huffington Post Speculation is rife on who will replace Michael Flynn as President Donald Trump’s national security adviser. “ Late Show ” host Stephen Colbert has a pertinent suggestion, but it most probably won’t go down well in Washington, D.C. Check out the clip above to see who Colbert thinks would fit the role, which Flynn left after 24 days amid allegations he discussed the U.S. sanctions against Russia with its ambassador in the weeks before Trump took office.
